name: Chruvidhya: E-Learning
desc: This Live provides an e-learning platform for university students, offering access to courses with video lectures and supplementary materials. Users have access to a personalized dashboard that enables the track their learning progress, course tracking and review approvals by designated reviewers.

name: Smart Assistant

name: Employe Management
desc: An employee management system (EMS) is a tool that helps improve employee productivity and satisfaction. It can also help companies achieve their goals by streamlining HR services and using analytics to make business decisions

name: Tic-Tec-Toe
desc: Tic-tac-toe, noughts and crosses, or Xs and Os is a paper-and-pencil game for two players who take turns marking the spaces in a three-by-three grid with X or O. The player who succeeds in placing three of their marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row is the winner

name: Shift : The Shopping App
desc: Empowers local sellers to increase online sales and expand their businesses through a dedicated platform. Allows local sellers to showcase and sell products online, overcoming bias towards big brands on major online platforms.

name: Patient Management
desc: Patient care management is a program that involves comprehensive health services to assist patients in managing their health, including primary care practices like scheduling appointments to short-term case management and chronic illness care management.
